component.name: Screenshot Widget
component.summary: A screenshot widget for the Budgie desktop

description.p: Take a screenshot of your desktop, a window or region; save to disk and upload. Screenshot Widget lives in your panel and features a clean interface for quickly taking screenshots and sharing them.
Among other things, Screenshot Applet can:

ul.li: Take a screenshot of your whole desktop, window or a selected area on the screen
Upload your screenshots to various online services
Keep a history of your screenshots
